inclusion.criterion: Histologically confirmed early stage urothelial carcinoma of the bladder defined as Ta, T1, or Tis stage.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Presence of either an FGFR3 mutation or FGFR3 over-expression within bladder tumor tissue.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Documented BCG-refractory disease defined as failure to achieve a tumor free state after at least 2 prior induction courses of intravesical BCG therapy.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Medically unfit to undergo cystectomy or electively choosing to forego cystectomy.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients who give a written informed consent obtained according to local guidelines.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with muscle-invasive (i.e. T2, T3, T4), locally advanced non-resectable, or metastatic urothelial carcinoma as assessed on baseline radiographic imaging obtained within 28 days prior to study registration.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with concurrent upper urinary tract (i.e. ureter, renal pelvis) non-invasive urothelial carcinoma.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient is a 63-year-old man presenting to the Emergency Department with a history of acute urinary retention in the past 2 days.
